title: 41% Winrate Azir 6.15 LOL

embed.description: LoL Statistics, Builds, Runes, Masteries, Skill Orders, Counters and Matchups for Azir when played Middle. Statistics include Azir's Win Rate, Play Rate and Ban Rate. Counters include who Azir Middle is Strong or Weak Against.

body:
...and that's with a sub 5% playrate and greater than normal average # of games for the Azir players. This is from over 18k games in Plat+ so it's hard to argue that sample size and skill are the big issues. He's also disappeared entirely from competitive. Even Olaf didn't get gutted that hard. 

I don't even play Azir at all. This is just comical and quintessential Riot balancing. This is why I actually fear that they buff a champion I like to play. If they buff him enough that he becomes problematic, the nerfs will gut him to a worse state than pre-buff.

replies.body: Azir nerf was extreme.Look other champions nerfs.Karma, Viktor, Vlad, Fizz, Malzahar nerfs are small and fair.

That's because those champions haven't proven impossible to nerf out of a 100% pick rate in competitive with the possible exception of Azir, and when those champions are strong their win rate is typically at least 3% higher than Azir's to begin with. Of course they've not gutted Malz, he's only been a popular pick for like one patch. Azir has been strangling diversity for two seasons.

> [{quoted}](name=MotherTeresa1910,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=v4ElPiBt,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-08-10T17:00:11.767+0000)
>

Of course they've not gutted Malz, he's only been a popular pick for like one patch. Azir has been strangling diversity for two seasons.

Still extreme.Still overnerf.

> [{quoted}](name=MotherTeresa1910,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=v4ElPiBt,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-08-10T17:00:11.767+0000)

"Azir has been strangling diversity for two seasons" can you actually back this up or is it something you pulled out of your ass?
I don't know about you but i'm maintaining a good 50% wr with azir.

> [{quoted}](name=Deathtoll321,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=v4ElPiBt,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2016-08-11T05:28:46.974+0000)

Azir nerf was extreme!

I used to love Azir, he released and i endured the bugs 
He was pretty much the only champion o played for 6 months. I even kept playing him during the period right before season 4 end whern rito broke his ult (moved through enemies, no damage, no knockback, no impassible terrain 100% just a visible nothingness)

But rito removed so much fun stuff from his kit when not adressing legitimate balnxe problems with him.  Everytime they took something off his kit he felt less fun. 
I can't even play him anymore because i just miss those aspects. He is no longer the champ gameplay wise i fell in love with.  (Still love his character/lore)
Goooooooooooooooooooooooooood.
And will still be picked in LCS...and people will STILL bitch saying balance is around the pros when it would clearly not be.

> [{quoted}](name=x Bush x,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=v4ElPiBt,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2016-08-10T13:12:22.178+0000)

Go home, you're drunk.

Firstly you learn Azir, you should too many Azir games then you should talk.

And I left Azir because he is very weak  so don't teach Azir to me.I know Azir at least but your hate doesn't allow to see.

> [{quoted}](name=What is Snowball,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=v4ElPiBt,comment-id=00060000000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-08-10T14:30:28.889+0000)
>
> If you know azir then you'd know how powerful he can be. I'm saying he's in a balanced state, it's an opinion. You're saying you're the right one. My opinion is he's balanced, not a godlike overpowered scum champion

He isn't balanced state because he is very weak so you don't know Azir so you don't know balance so you shouldn't talk about Azir.Azir wasn't godlike before last nerf, Azir never happened godlike.Azir was dominated but he wasn't godlike.Your argument is simple and same absurdity with Riot's argument.

in azirs case, they basically nuked him until he gets a rework.

the problem was that they gave him nerf after nerf after nerf and it didnt seem to do anything to him. he was still op in pro play and high ranked games due to the sheer utility, mobility and dps combination he had.

so with that last nerf they really hammered him into the ground to make sure that he stops to be a problem this time until they know how to balance him properly.

It's really sad to see characters like Azir and Kalista be gutted this hard considering the insane amount of executional excellence required to be played properly in the first place. Yes these characters have a lot of strengths, but that's largely balanced by the fact that they require the player to play perfectly _all the time_ in order to tap into that power. What's the point of these character if dedicated mains can't even make it worth the time investment? Why should a character that require 3 inputs to accomplish something be eclipsed by another champion who require a simple button press? 

They already suffer from a massive skill ceiling and inconsistency. Why do their numbers need to be gimped so far on top of that?

I really don't understand how so many people suddenly have qualms vs Azir. 

Have they played the guy? It's hard man. Just because pros can use his range mobility doesn't mean everyone and their grandma can.
Holy shit the dumb crying and whining Azir QQers haven't downvoted this post to oblivion.

Problem is that.They nerfed Azir's damage and waveclear.This is completely false.Azir needed utility nerf Azir's damage wasn't problem.Moreover Azir's waveclear never happened problem.

Azir damage (soldiers) is his waveclear so I didn't like last nerf.

> [{quoted}](name=Treune81,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=v4ElPiBt,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-08-10T11:09:10.621+0000)
>
> Problem is that.They nerfed Azir's damage and waveclear.This is completely false.Azir needed utility nerf Azir's damage wasn't problem.Moreover Azir's waveclear never happened problem.
> 
> Azir damage (soldiers) is his waveclear so I didn't like last nerf.

This is one of my major annoyances with how they nerfed Azir. They took the time to go in and remove nearly all of his utility (which I thought was actually the part of his kit that made him fun and unique to play) which really left Azir as just another high damage dealer. But then they decide to go ahead and nerf his damage anyways the patch after.

Azir needs his utility back. Ever since it's been taken away, he just feels bland and boring to play.

Ok as Azir used to be one of my maina (trust me i have hundreds of games in total on azir).
if you look @ that reddit thread that i believe a riot employee posted in sub azirmains or some shyt. he was talking about how azir needed a huge rework. He said they needed to either remove his Shurima shuffle ( W then E then Q to move farther then just QE) and give him his dmg back OR he said Keep the shuffle and turn him into a mid rage utility champ ( no more safe azir play, or poke and zone with good wq). he also talked about removing both and a bunch of different stuff!. Being a player that remembers old ORiana Q RANGE (omg op) and Heimer(OP) and YORICK(op) and was Stupid good on OLD CASS, this makes me so sad! Azirs whole identity is going to get changed. I didnt play azir because he was a "MONSTER" or OP! i played azir because he was fun and i liked the play style and when i got good with him i was rewarded for it! NOW there is no fun to play him because i get craped on!. Lets talk a D1 ap main getting beat in lane by a Gold brand or even ahri or viktor. Playing azir and expecting any kind of reward for good decision making and great playmaking is unsatisfying! playing azir just makes me a TOXIC player because one of my fav champs is just useless! (YES riot PLZ REFUND MY SKIN BTW) 
its dumb that because azir was a huge contested pick in PRO play like .2 % of players or something maybe less RIots like WE GATTA GUT THIs champ! Riot needs to admit that they dont know how to balance him.. and just be like O WELL This is why we have PICKS AND BANS  b4 THE GAMES! Really why ruin azir for 99% of the players.. HIS Win rate wasnt even that good B 4 this last nerf in ranked... Come on riot dont be like **NIANTIC** and not tell us the truth or any plans. Just keep quiet and maybe we will all forget azir exists!

Azir is just a champion that doesent fit in a moba style of game, hes like an unit took straightly from an rts, that is extremely overpowered if used right, but meanwhile his winrate is getting screwed by people who dont know how to play him.

"that is extremely overpowered if used right"
Which is why Plat+ players with 125+ games on him are still doing absolutely horribly?
Or is it fine that the only people that can do not trash with him are LCS level players? Where even then, they don't do that well?

I mean, who expected, that nerfing everything except his oppressive laning, would gut him in the end?

I surely _haven't_ called it back when his ult was getting nerfed.
Tbh I could see where Azir was heading from when they removed the knock up from his E, from then I detached myself from what was at the time, my favourite champ.

Tons of "only Azir", "AzirMain","lvl7Azir","Azir mai waifu" players abused Azir to get to ELO they don't deserve when he was broken AF.

It is obvious and expected that the same "Azir mai waifu" 125+ games accounts now have low winrate.
